text: BEXCO station () is a station on the Busan Metro Line 2 and Donghae Line in U-dong, Haeundae District, Busan, South Korea. The subname in parentheses is "Busan Museum of Art". The metro station was formerly named "Busan Museum of Art Station", and the Donghae Line station was formerly "Uil Station". ==Station Layout== ===Line 2=== {|style="text-align:center;" |- | ↑ |- || S/B N/B |- | ↓ |} {| border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="3" frame="hsides" rules="rows" |- !
